# core.functions.abs_ { #optyx.core.functions.abs_ }

```python
core.functions.abs_(x)
```

Absolute value.

Note: Named abs_ to avoid shadowing Python's built-in abs.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                                                                  | Description                  | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------|------------|
| x      | [Expression](`optyx.core.expressions.Expression`) \| [float](`float`) | Expression or numeric value. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                        | Description                    |
|--------|---------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|
|        | [UnaryOp](`optyx.core.expressions.UnaryOp`) | Expression representing \|x\|. |
